name: 奥托·冯·格里克
bio_short: 德国科学家、发明家和政治家。他发明了第一台静电起电机（`guericke_static_generator_1663`），并用他著名的“马格德堡半球”实验（`guericke_vacuum_1654`）证明了真空的存在和大气压强的威力。
bio_short_en: A German scientist, inventor, and politician. He invented the first electrostatic generator (`guericke_static_generator_1663`) and demonstrated the power of atmospheric pressure and the existence of a vacuum with his famous 'Magdeburg hemispheres' experiment (`guericke_vacuum_1654`).
